sentences.english: How do I know you're really Casanova ?
sentences.chinese: 我怎么知道你真是卡萨诺瓦？

sentences.english: So what did Casanova do that night?
sentences.chinese: 那天晚上卡萨诺瓦做了什么？

sentences.english: I don't know. What would Casanova do?
sentences.chinese: 我不知道，卡萨诺瓦会怎么做？

sentences.english: Giacomo Casanova himself was said to court maidens in the gardens around the Cipriani spa.
sentences.chinese: 据说，“情圣”卡萨诺瓦在花园里曾向姑娘们求过爱。

sentences.english: Where can I watch Casanova Brown movie online free full stream?
sentences.chinese: 我在哪里可以看电影卡萨诺瓦布朗网上免费全速？

sentences.english: Is this the palazzo of Signor Casanova?
sentences.chinese: 这是卡萨诺瓦的宅邸吗？
